text: Mike Hall (born 1982) is a sportscaster who currently is employed by the Big Ten Network working on college football and basketball games. He is also a Chicago sideline reporter for the NFL on Fox. He also worked for ESPN anchoring SportsCenter and called college hockey for ESPN and was an anchor on ESPNEWS. Category:Living people Category:1982 births Category:College basketball broadcasters Category:College football broadcasters Category:National Football League broadcasters
title: Mike Hall
